overview: Just whose bidness is it if Mike Epps wants to get up on stage and work blue? It's your bidness, if you want to see a raw, raunchy, and riotous comedy program featuring the "How High" and "Friday After Next" star on the stage, in the streets, and in your face! 90 min. Widescreen; Soundtrack: English.
title: Mike Epps: Funny Bidness
